CustomField.description: **System Calculated/Override** Checked when the value of the Fundraising Preferences custom setting field "Gift Opportunity Closed Won Stages" for the running user matches the stage of the record, otherwise the field is unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated/Override** Checked when the value of the Fundraising Preferences custom setting field "Gift Opportunity Closed Won Stages" for the running user matches the stage of the record, otherwise the field is unchecked.
CustomField.label: Is Won
